thread.title: $39+ Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest
thread.title_full: $39+ Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest

title: $39+ Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest
text:
$39+ Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest $39+ Nonstop Flights on Sale from Southwest August 27, 2015 1:35pm   
Southwest's new airfare sale discounts flights from autumn 2015 to as far off as spring 2016, and all across the nation. Flights on the 1,100 nonstop routes start at $39 one-way ($78 round-trip), and must be booked by 11:59 p.m. on September 3. 
Most routes permit travel September 8 - March 3, with the exception of the following blackout dates:   December 1; December 26 - 28; January 2, 3; February 11, 15, 16; or Fridays or Sundays. See the sale provider for travel t ... more 
Southwest's new airfare sale discounts flights from autumn 2015 to as far off as spring 2016, and all across the nation. Flights on the 1,100 nonstop routes start at $39 one-way ($78 round-trip), and must be booked by 11:59 p.m. on September 3. 
Most routes permit travel September 8 - March 3, with the exception of the following blackout dates:   December 1; December 26 - 28; January 2, 3; February 11, 15, 16; or Fridays or Sundays. See the sale provider for travel to/from Florida, Nevada, and Puerto Rico. 
American Airlines has just launched a competing sale with pricing from $45.50. Both sales feature the same travel window and booking deadline.   Southwest 's sale page. Pros:
